article_title: Gaza health ministry says Jabalia strikes kill 110
sentence: At  least  110  people  have  been  killed  in  Israeli  air  strikes  in  northern  Gaza's  Jabalia  area,  the  Hamas-run  health  ministry  says,  as  fighting  continues  across  the  Palestinian  territory.

article_title: Gaza health ministry says Jabalia strikes kill 110
sentence: Fifty  people  were  reportedly  killed  and  dozens  trapped  under  rubble  when  three  homes  in  Jabalia  refugee  camp  were  hit.

article_title: Gaza health ministry says Jabalia strikes kill 110
sentence: Gaza  has  been  devastated  by  10  weeks  of  war  triggered  by  an  unprecedented  attack  by  Hamas  gunmen  on  southern  Israel  on  7  October,  in  which  at  least  1,200  people  -  mostly  civilians  -  were  killed  and  about  240  taken  hostage.

article_title: Gaza health ministry says Jabalia strikes kill 110
sentence: Since  then,  more  than  19,400  people  have  been  killed  in  Gaza,  about  70%  of  them  women  and  children,  according  to  the  Hamas-run  health  ministry.

article_title: Gaza health ministry says Jabalia strikes kill 110
sentence: On  Monday  morning,  Palestinian  media  cited  the  Hamas-run  health  ministry's  director  general  as  saying  that  at  least  50  people  had  been  killed  when  the  homes  of  the  al-Bursh  and  Alwan  families  were  bombed.

article_title: Gaza health ministry says Jabalia strikes kill 110
sentence: Gaza's  health  ministry  also  said  that  a  13-year-old  girl  was  killed  when  an  Israeli  tank  shell  hit  the  maternity  building  of  Nasser  Hospital  in  the  southern  city  of  Khan  Younis  on  Sunday  night.

article_title: Gaza health ministry says Jabalia strikes kill 110
sentence: The  girl,  Dunia  Abu  Mohsen,  had  been  receiving  treatment  after  losing  a  leg  in  a  previous  strike  in  al-Amal  that  killed  her  parents,  brother  and  sister.

article_title: Gaza health ministry says Jabalia strikes kill 110
sentence: Another  eight  people,  including  journalist  Haneen  al-Qashtan,  were  reportedly  killed  in  a  strike  in  Nuseirat  refugee  camp,  in  central  Gaza.

article_title: Gaza health ministry says Jabalia strikes kill 110
sentence: The  UK,  Germany  and  France  added  to  the  growing  global  pressure  for  a  ceasefire  over  the  weekend,  saying  that  too  many  civilians  had  been  killed.
